item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 26, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. YC Graveyard: 821 inactive Y Combinator startups (74 points | 41 comments)
2. Steam Brick: No screen, no controller, just a power button and a USB port (469 points | 119 comments)
3. DeepSeek-R1: Incentivizing Reasoning Capability in LLMs via RL (723 points | 594 comments)
4. The South Vietnamese pilot who landed a Cessna on a carrier to save his family (2019) (179 points | 73 comments)
5. OpenRA – Classic strategy games rebuilt for the modern era (379 points | 65 comments)
6. Emerging Reasoning with Reinforcement Learning (137 points | 110 comments)
7. AI slop, suspicion, and writing back (66 points | 44 comments)
8. SQLook – A free online SQLite database manager with a Windows 2000 interface (105 points | 30 comments)
9. An invalid 68030 instruction accidentally allowed the Mac Classic II to boot (216 points | 35 comments)
10. SigNoz (YC W21) Is hiring back end engineers to build open-source Datadog ( | hide)
11. Every HTML Element (290 points | 95 comments)
12. The Graphics Codex (15 points | discuss)
13. Apache Iceberg (79 points | 23 comments)
14. Bacteria in Polymers Form Cables That Grow into Living Gels (24 points | discuss)
15. Searching for DeepSeek's glitch tokens (137 points | 37 comments)

20. You probably don't need query builders (98 points | 85 comments)
21. Open Heart Protocol (192 points | 79 comments)
22. Chimera Linux works toward a simplified desktop (62 points | 41 comments)
23. Mastering Atari Games with Natural Intelligence (10 points | 3 comments)
24. Using AI to develop a fuller model of the human brain (63 points | 23 comments)
25. Immutability Changes Everything (2016) [pdf] (85 points | 25 comments)
26. A FPGA friendly 32 bit RISC-V CPU implementation (99 points | 48 comments)
27. How far can you get in 40 minutes from each subway station in NYC? (269 points | 162 comments)
28. Fault Tolerance in Tandem Computer Systems (1986) [pdf] (43 points | 25 comments)
29. CIA now favors lab leak theory to explain Covid's origins (427 points | 540 comments)
30. Show HN: I built a DIY plane spotting system at home (174 points | 73 comments)
